alert.note: Alert for Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 10:39AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Above Flat Woods affecting Wayne and Perry Counties. For the Buffalo River...including Flat Woods...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Buffalo River Above Flat Woods. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water begins to inundate low lying agricultural land along the river from northern Wayne County to near Linden in Perry County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 15.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM CST.
